mapper.select: WHERE deletedInd != true ORDER BY artist,album,discnumber,tracknumber
mapper.update: UPDATE music.track SET deletedInd = #{deletedInd} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO music.track (title, location, album, artist, albumartist, genre, "year", discnumber, tracknumber, comment, deletedInd) VALUES(#{track.title}, #{track.location}, #{track.album}, #{track.artist}, #{track.albumArtist}, #{track.genre}, #{track.year}, #{track.discNumber}, #{track.trackNumber}, #{track.comment}, #{track.deletedInd}) ON CONFLICT (location) DO UPDATE set title = #{track.title}, album = #{track.album}, artist = #{track.artist}, albumartist = #{track.albumArtist}, genre = #{track.genre}, "year" = #{track.year}, discnumber = #{track.discNumber}, tracknumber = #{track.trackNumber}, comment = #{track.comment}
